static void acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::AllowOnlineNotifications ( const bool &  option)
static

SetEnable will enable or disable the device to receive Online Push Notifications. The endpoint will not be disabled, just the code that displays the PN.

Parameters
option,:true to enable Online PNs. false to disable Online PNs.
static bool acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::AreOnlineNotificationsEnabled ( )
static

IsEnable will determine if the application has Online PNs enabled or not. This is only reflect calls to SetEnable. There is no way to determine if the user disabled PNs from the Application Settings.

static int acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::DeleteMessageGroup ( const int &  groupType)
static

DeleteMessageGroup will delete all local PNs registered under a certain message group.

Parameters
groupTypeis the group identifier to be deleted.
Returns
integer value for result, Operation Successful (0)
static int acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::GetDeviceToken ( const acp_utils::helpers::NotificationTransportType &  transport,
AppReceiverCallback  callbackReceiver,
void *  caller 
)
static

Get Device Token will retrieve the Online Notification token provided by the 3rd party server (Google or Amazon)

Parameters
transport,:The type of transport, can be GCM (for Google Play) or ADM (for Amazon PNs)
callbackReceiver,:The callback that will receive the token
caller,:the caller which requests the token
Returns
: 1 means invalid transport (NotificationTransportType is invalid), 0 means success and a callback will be received
static std::string acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::IsAppLaunchedFromPN ( )
static

IsAppLaunchedFromPN returns an serialized Json string containing PN data in case of the application was launched/resumed from a PN. Return empty string in case of the application was launched without tapping a PN.

static int acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::SendMessage ( std::map< std::string, std::string > &  messageData,
time_t  targetTime,
const int &  groupType 
)
static

SendMessage will put a Local PN alert in the system, and assigned it to a group.

Parameters
messageDatacontains PN data by using std::map<std::string, std::string>
targetTimeis the target date for delivering messages.
groupTypeallows setting a group id in order to create multiple PN groups.
Returns
integer value for result, Operation Successful (0)
static int acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::SendMessage ( acp_utils::helpers::LocalPn &  i_pn)
static

SendMessage will put a Local PN alert in the system, and assigned it to a group.

Parameters
LocalPn,:Alternative for SendMessage with parameters. See above
Returns
integer value for result, Operation Successful (0)
static void acp_utils::modules::SimplifiedPN::ShowAppDetailsSettings ( )
static

Method that opens the Application Details Setting page. av TODO: It makes more sense to have this function in package_utils, rather then in the PN module!
